translations.jp: エターナルマスターズ

cards.name: Aven Riftwatcher
cards.text:
Flying
Vanishing 3 (This creature enters the battlefield with three time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter from it. When the last is removed, sacrifice it.)
When Aven Riftwatcher enters the battlefield or leaves the battlefield, you gain 2 life.

cards.name: Balance
cards.text: Each player chooses a number of lands he or she controls equal to the number of lands controlled by the player who controls the fewest, then sacrifices the rest. Players discard cards and sacrifice creatures the same way.

cards.flavor: A kithkin's worst enemy is solitude.
cards.name: Ballynock Cohort
cards.text:
First strike
Ballynock Cohort gets +1/+1 as long as you control another white creature.

cards.flavor: "My destiny is to save others so their destinies may be achieved."
cards.name: Benevolent Bodyguard
cards.text: Sacrifice Benevolent Bodyguard: Target creature you control gains protection from the color of your choice until end of turn.

cards.name: Calciderm
cards.text:
Shroud (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities.)
Vanishing 4 (This creature enters the battlefield with four time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter from it. When the last is removed, sacrifice it.)

cards.flavor: Giving little thought to their own defense, they carried the flag that united their army.
cards.name: Coalition Honor Guard
cards.text: While choosing targets as part of casting a spell or activating an ability, your opponents must choose at least one Flagbearer on the battlefield if able.

cards.flavor: "Virtue is an inner light that can prevail in every soul."
cards.name: Eight-and-a-Half-Tails
cards.text:
{1}{W}: Target permanent you control gains protection from white until end of turn.
{1}: Target spell or permanent becomes white until end of turn.

cards.flavor: The vanguard is skilled at waging war alone. The enemy is often defeated before its reinforcements reach the front.
cards.name: Elite Vanguard

cards.flavor:
"Organization is often undervalued but rarely unjustified."
—Frasio, royal archivist
cards.name: Enlightened Tutor
cards.text: Search your library for an artifact or enchantment card and reveal that card. Shuffle your library, then put the card on top of it.

cards.name: Faith's Fetters
cards.text:
Enchant permanent
When Faith's Fetters enters the battlefield, you gain 4 life.
Enchanted permanent's activated abilities can't be activated unless they're mana abilities. If enchanted permanent is a creature, it can't attack or block.

cards.name: Field of Souls
cards.text: Whenever a nontoken creature is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying.

cards.name: Glimmerpoint Stag
cards.text:
Vigilance
When Glimmerpoint Stag enters the battlefield, exile another target permanent. Return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control at the beginning of the next end step.

cards.flavor: To the sorrow of all, its fire was turned toward those who worshipped it.
cards.name: Honden of Cleansing Fire
cards.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, you gain 2 life for each Shrine you control.

cards.flavor: Through failure we learn our finest lessons in humility.
cards.name: Humble
cards.text: Until end of turn, target creature loses all abilities and has base power and toughness 0/1.

cards.flavor: In life, they were a motley crew: farmers, lords, cutpurses, priests. In death, they are united in singular, benevolent purpose.
cards.name: Intangible Virtue
cards.text: Creature tokens you control get +1/+1 and have vigilance.

cards.flavor: Light's champion in the stronghold of darkness.
cards.name: Jareth, Leonine Titan
cards.text:
Whenever Jareth, Leonine Titan blocks, it gets +7/+7 until end of turn.
{W}: Jareth gains protection from the color of your choice until end of turn.

cards.name: Karmic Guide
cards.text:
Flying, protection from black
Echo {3}{W}{W} (At the beginning of your upkeep, if this came under your control since the beginning of your last upkeep, sacrifice it unless you pay its echo cost.)
When Karmic Guide enters the battlefield, return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.

cards.flavor: "For us, a rope represents the ties that bind the kor. For you, it's more literal."
cards.name: Kor Hookmaster
cards.text: When Kor Hookmaster enters the battlefield, tap target creature an opponent controls. That creature doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.

cards.flavor: "Scholars seek to understand the way the world is. I wish to shape the world into what it should be."
cards.name: Mesa Enchantress
cards.text: Whenever you cast an enchantment spell, you may draw a card.

cards.flavor: Some sky steeds break from the thundering herd to ride free on the open winds.
cards.name: Mistral Charger
cards.text: Flying

cards.flavor: "Belief is the strongest mortar."
cards.name: Monk Idealist
cards.text: When Monk Idealist enters the battlefield, return target enchantment card from your graveyard to your hand.

cards.flavor: She will not touch a weapon, yet she is the greatest protector her people have ever known.
cards.name: Mother of Runes
cards.text: {T}: Target creature you control gains protection from the color of your choice until end of turn.

cards.flavor: For the first time in his life, Grakk felt a little warm and fuzzy inside.
cards.name: Pacifism
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature can't attack or block.

cards.flavor: Like blinking or breathing, responding to an alarm is an involuntary reflex.
cards.name: Raise the Alarm
cards.text: Create two 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens.

cards.flavor:
"If you must go out at night, bring a mob."
—Master of the Elgaud Cathars
cards.name: Rally the Peasants
cards.text:
Creatures you control get +2/+0 until end of turn.
Flashback {2}{R} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

cards.flavor:
"Find the dens of evil and flood them with light."
—Hulo, the Penitent Wanderer
cards.name: Seal of Cleansing
cards.text: Sacrifice Seal of Cleansing: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.

cards.flavor: It suddenly dawned on Jorin that farming was quite a noble profession.
cards.name: Second Thoughts
cards.text:
Exile target attacking creature.
Draw a card.

cards.flavor: Follow the light. In its absence, follow her.
cards.name: Serra Angel
cards.text:
Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
Vigilance (Attacking doesn't cause this creature to tap.)

cards.flavor: Good strategists seize opportunities. Great strategists make their own.
cards.name: Shelter
cards.text:
Target creature you control gains protection from the color of your choice until end of turn.
Draw a card.

cards.flavor: "Their spirits walk the winds and fill my soul."
cards.name: Soulcatcher
cards.text:
Flying
Whenever a creature with flying dies, put a +1/+1 counter on Soulcatcher.

cards.name: Squadron Hawk
cards.text:
Flying
When Squadron Hawk enters the battlefield, you may search your library for up to three cards named Squadron Hawk, reveal them, put them into your hand, then shuffle your library.

cards.flavor: The smallest seed of regret can bloom into redemption.
cards.name: Swords to Plowshares
cards.text: Exile target creature. Its controller gains life equal to its power.

cards.flavor: Once you've been dragged down the currents of time, you'll never quite trust your own permanence again.
cards.name: Unexpectedly Absent
cards.text: Put target nonland permanent into its owner's library just beneath the top X cards of that library.

cards.flavor:
"I search for a vision of Zendikar that does not include the Eldrazi."
—Expedition journal entry
cards.name: Wall of Omens
cards.text:
Defender
When Wall of Omens enters the battlefield, draw a card.

cards.flavor: "Let nothing take away from the purity of swords clashing or of arrows taking flight toward the breast of evil."
cards.name: War Priest of Thune
cards.text: When War Priest of Thune enters the battlefield, you may destroy target enchantment.

cards.flavor:
"Those talons really dig into your skin, but it's better than being dropped."
—Rafiq of the Many
cards.name: Welkin Guide
cards.text:
Flying
When Welkin Guide enters the battlefield, target creature gets +2/+2 and gains flying until end of turn.

cards.flavor: Saltfield nomads call a sudden storm a "whitemane."
cards.name: Whitemane Lion
cards.text:
Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)
When Whitemane Lion enters the battlefield, return a creature you control to its owner's hand.

cards.name: Wrath of God
cards.text: Destroy all creatures. They can't be regenerated.

cards.flavor: He has journeyed where none have been before. Now he returns to ensure that none follow.
cards.name: Arcanis the Omnipotent
cards.text:
{T}: Draw three cards.
{2}{U}{U}: Return Arcanis the Omnipotent to its owner's hand.

cards.flavor: The mizzium-sphere array drove her mind deep into the thought field, where only the rarest motes of genius may be plucked.
cards.name: Brainstorm
cards.text: Draw three cards, then put two cards from your hand on top of your library in any order.

cards.name: Cephalid Sage
cards.text: Threshold — As long as seven or more cards are in your graveyard, Cephalid Sage has "When Cephalid Sage enters the battlefield, draw three cards, then discard two cards."

cards.flavor: If you don't have the best toys, find the one who does.
cards.name: Control Magic
cards.text:
Enchant creature
You control enchanted creature.

cards.name: Counterspell
cards.text: Counter target spell.

cards.name: Daze
cards.text:
You may return an Island you control to its owner's hand rather than pay Daze's mana cost.
Counter target spell unless its controller pays {1}.

cards.flavor: "No fact escapes me. Why do you think you can?"
cards.name: Deep Analysis
cards.text:
Target player draws two cards.
Flashback—{1}{U}, Pay 3 life. (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

cards.name: Diminishing Returns
cards.text: Each player shuffles his or her hand and graveyard into his or her library. You exile the top ten cards of your library. Then each player draws up to seven cards.

cards.name: Dream Twist
cards.text:
Target player puts the top three cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard.
Flashback {1}{U} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

cards.name: Fact or Fiction
cards.text: Reveal the top five cards of your library. An opponent separates those cards into two piles. Put one pile into your hand and the other into your graveyard.

cards.flavor: "I alone determine my destiny."
cards.name: Force of Will
cards.text:
You may pay 1 life and exile a blue card from your hand rather than pay Force of Will's mana cost.
Counter target spell.

cards.flavor:
"Is the inevitable any less miraculous?"
—Veldka, wandering sage
cards.name: Future Sight
cards.text:
Play with the top card of your library revealed.
You may play the top card of your library.

cards.flavor:
"It's hard to hurt anyone when you're as transparent as your motives."
—Ertai, wizard adept
cards.name: Gaseous Form
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to and dealt by enchanted creature.

cards.flavor: In the coastal states of Jhess and Valeron, "tortoise" is a synonym for "stubborn."
cards.name: Giant Tortoise
cards.text: Giant Tortoise gets +0/+3 as long as it's untapped.

cards.flavor:
"There is no confusion as to the boundary of the archmage's territory."
—Ippin, master cartographer
cards.name: Glacial Wall
cards.text: Defender (This creature can't attack.)

cards.flavor: To the sorrow of all, its winds found sin in the hearts of those who once learned from its wisdom.
cards.name: Honden of Seeing Winds
cards.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, draw a card for each Shrine you control.

cards.flavor: Fire can be savage, but it is fickle. Water is always true, its flow steady and world-shaping.
cards.name: Hydroblast
cards.text:
Choose one —
• Counter target spell if it's red.
• Destroy target permanent if it's red.

cards.flavor:
"Into its maw went the seventh sea, never to be seen again while the world remains."
—Esper fable
cards.name: Inkwell Leviathan
cards.text:
Islandwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls an Island.)
Trample
Shroud (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities.)

cards.name: Jace, the Mind Sculptor
cards.text:
+2: Look at the top card of target player's library. You may put that card on the bottom of that player's library.
0: Draw three cards, then put two cards from your hand on top of your library in any order.
−1: Return target creature to its owner's hand.
−12: Exile all cards from target player's library, then that player shuffles his or her hand into his or her library.

cards.flavor: The bolt struck with a flash, and there was a terrible sound, as of glass shattering, but the creature was unharmed.
cards.name: Jetting Glasskite
cards.text:
Flying
Whenever Jetting Glasskite becomes the target of a spell or ability for the first time each turn, counter that spell or ability.

cards.flavor:
"Beauty to the eye does not always translate to the touch."
—Naimah, Femeref philosopher
cards.name: Man-o'-War
cards.text: When Man-o'-War enters the battlefield, return target creature to its owner's hand.

cards.flavor: What a lonely agony, the memory of memories lost.
cards.name: Memory Lapse
cards.text: Counter target spell. If that spell is countered this way, put it on top of its owner's library instead of into that player's graveyard.

cards.flavor: Merfolk don't always know what they're looking for, but they're certain once they find it.
cards.name: Merfolk Looter
cards.text: {T}: Draw a card, then discard a card.

cards.flavor: The student searches the world for meaning. The master finds worlds of meaning in the search.
cards.name: Mystical Tutor
cards.text: Search your library for an instant or sorcery card and reveal that card. Shuffle your library, then put the card on top of it.

cards.flavor: Oona grants her favored subjects a dream from her own guarded heart.
cards.name: Oona's Grace
cards.text:
Target player draws a card.
Retrace (You may cast this card from your graveyard by discarding a land card in addition to paying its other costs.)

cards.flavor:
"Always a welcome sight breaking through the clouds."
—Talrand, sky summoner
cards.name: Peregrine Drake
cards.text:
Flying
When Peregrine Drake enters the battlefield, untap up to five lands.

cards.flavor: Is it an amalgamation of faded memories or the projection of a half-remembered dream? Neither answer offers any comfort.
cards.name: Phantom Monster
cards.text: Flying

cards.name: Phyrexian Ingester
cards.text:
Imprint — When Phyrexian Ingester enters the battlefield, you may exile target nontoken creature.
Phyrexian Ingester gets +X/+Y, where X is the exiled creature card's power and Y is its toughness.

cards.flavor: "You can't learn to enjoy life's amusements in the pages of books. You must seek them out in earnest."
cards.name: Prodigal Sorcerer
cards.text: {T}: Prodigal Sorcerer deals 1 damage to target creature or player.

cards.flavor:
"The best foresight is hindsight."
—Empress Llawan
cards.name: Quiet Speculation
cards.text: Search target player's library for up to three cards with flashback and put them into that player's graveyard. Then the player shuffles his or her library.

cards.flavor: Its screeching is the sound of you losing your mind.
cards.name: Screeching Skaab
cards.text: When Screeching Skaab enters the battlefield, put the top two cards of your library into your graveyard.

cards.flavor: Summoners of efreeti remember only the power of command, never the sting of regret.
cards.name: Serendib Efreet
cards.text:
Flying
At the beginning of your upkeep, Serendib Efreet deals 1 damage to you.

cards.name: Shoreline Ranger
cards.text:
Flying
Islandcycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Search your library for an Island card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.)

cards.flavor: The same magic that lets geists pass through our realm can force them out of it.
cards.name: Silent Departure
cards.text:
Return target creature to its owner's hand.
Flashback {4}{U} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

cards.flavor: "By thorn and by stone, we will fight to see the day when beauty returns to this world."
cards.name: Sprite Noble
cards.text:
Flying
Other creatures you control with flying get +0/+1.
{T}: Other creatures you control with flying get +1/+0 until end of turn.

cards.flavor: "A warrior without wit is simply meat."
cards.name: Stupefying Touch
cards.text:
Enchant creature
When Stupefying Touch enters the battlefield, draw a card.
Enchanted creature's activated abilities can't be activated.

cards.flavor:
"The floor of the sea is paved with the shattered remnants of vessels that navigated its surface unwelcomed."
—Thassa, god of the sea
cards.name: Tidal Wave
cards.text: Create a 5/5 blue Wall creature token with defender. Sacrifice it at the beginning of the next end step.

cards.flavor: On Evos Isle, the swift and formidable aven enforce the will of the ruling sphinxes.
cards.name: Warden of Evos Isle
cards.text:
Flying
Creature spells with flying you cast cost {1} less to cast.

cards.flavor:
"The awestruck birds gazed at Wonder. Slowly, timidly, they rose into the air."
—Scroll of Beginnings
cards.name: Wonder
cards.text:
Flying
As long as Wonder is in your graveyard and you control an Island, creatures you control have flying.

cards.name: Animate Dead
cards.text:
Enchant creature card in a graveyard
When Animate Dead enters the battlefield, if it's on the battlefield, it loses "enchant creature card in a graveyard" and gains "enchant creature put onto the battlefield with Animate Dead." Return enchanted creature card to the battlefield under your control and attach Animate Dead to it. When Animate Dead leaves the battlefield, that creature's controller sacrifices it.
Enchanted creature gets -1/-0.

cards.flavor:
"Whatever Yawgmoth marks, dies. There is no escape."
—Tsabo Tavoc, Phyrexian general
cards.name: Annihilate
cards.text:
Destroy target nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated.
Draw a card.

cards.flavor: "See the beauty in death: the clean white bones lying in the fertile soil and the brightly colored moonglove sprouting from the fell earth."
cards.name: Blightsoil Druid
cards.text: {T}, Pay 1 life: Add {G} to your mana pool.

cards.flavor: "Great art can never be created without great suffering."
cards.name: Blood Artist
cards.text: Whenever Blood Artist or another creature dies, target player loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.

cards.flavor: "Home is where you can find a decent graveyard and strangers can disappear without awkward questions."
cards.name: Braids, Cabal Minion
cards.text: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player sacrifices an artifact, creature, or land.

cards.name: Cabal Therapy
cards.text:
Name a nonland card. Target player reveals his or her hand and discards all cards with that name.
Flashback—Sacrifice a creature. (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

cards.flavor: Stinking of rot, it leaps between gravestones in search of its next meal.
cards.name: Carrion Feeder
cards.text:
Carrion Feeder can't block.
Sacrifice a creature: Put a +1/+1 counter on Carrion Feeder.

cards.flavor: Ending her life won't end the infestation.
cards.name: Deadbridge Shaman
cards.text: When Deadbridge Shaman dies, target opponent discards a card.

cards.flavor:
"Don't worry. I'm not going to deprive you of all your secrets. Just your most precious one."
—Liliana Vess
cards.name: Duress
cards.text: Target opponent reveals his or her hand. You choose a noncreature, nonland card from it. That player discards that card.

cards.flavor:
"I'll return once you've ripened."
—Ghoulcaller Gisa
cards.name: Entomb
cards.text: Search your library for a card and put that card into your graveyard. Then shuffle your library.

cards.flavor:
"Those without beauty are Lorwyn's greatest tumor. The winnowers have an unpleasant duty, but a necessary one."
—Eidren, perfect of Lys Alana
cards.name: Eyeblight's Ending
cards.text: Destroy target non-Elf creature.

cards.flavor: A full coffin is like a full coffer—both are attractive to thieves.
cards.name: Gravedigger
cards.text: When Gravedigger enters the battlefield, you may return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

cards.flavor: A cry of pain as it enters this world. A chorus of screams as it leaves.
cards.name: Havoc Demon
cards.text:
Flying
When Havoc Demon dies, all creatures get -5/-5 until end of turn.

cards.flavor: To the sorrow of all, its dark reach grasped and crushed those who guarded its silent vigil.
cards.name: Honden of Night's Reach
cards.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, target opponent discards a card for each Shrine you control.

cards.flavor: The priests plead for your anguish and pray for your despair.
cards.name: Hymn to Tourach
cards.text: Target player discards two cards at random.

cards.name: Ichorid
cards.text:
Haste
At the beginning of the end step, sacrifice Ichorid.
At the beginning of your upkeep, if Ichorid is in your graveyard, you may exile a black creature card other than Ichorid from your graveyard. If you do, return Ichorid to the battlefield.

cards.flavor: Zombies mourn for the living and celebrate those who will soon be given the gift of death.
cards.name: Innocent Blood
cards.text: Each player sacrifices a creature.

cards.flavor: In beauty-obsessed Lys Alana, one cut of her blade means the difference between a high society feast and raking through the dungheap for scraps.
cards.name: Lys Alana Scarblade
cards.text: {T}, Discard an Elf card: Target creature gets -X/-X until end of turn, where X is the number of Elves you control.

cards.flavor:
"Such an affliction appears to seek out the pure."
—Byro, plague doctor
cards.name: Malicious Affliction
cards.text:
Morbid — When you cast Malicious Affliction, if a creature died this turn, you may copy Malicious Affliction and may choose a new target for the copy.
Destroy target nonblack creature.

cards.flavor: "Was it something I said?"
cards.name: Nausea
cards.text: All creatures get -1/-1 until end of turn.

cards.name: Necropotence
cards.text:
Skip your draw step.
Whenever you discard a card, exile that card from your graveyard.
Pay 1 life: Exile the top card of your library face down. Put that card into your hand at the beginning of your next end step.

cards.flavor: His victims don't have time to feel despair.
cards.name: Nekrataal
cards.text:
First strike
When Nekrataal enters the battlefield, destroy target nonartifact, nonblack creature. That creature can't be regenerated.

cards.flavor:
"I have seen things that would reduce a weaker person to blubbering and raving. Want to hear about them?"
—Vraska
cards.name: Night's Whisper
cards.text: You draw two cards and you lose 2 life.

cards.flavor: Other Phyrexians have nightmares about the gargantua.
cards.name: Phyrexian Gargantua
cards.text: When Phyrexian Gargantua enters the battlefield, you draw two cards and you lose 2 life.

cards.flavor:
"I believe many worlds will bow to Phyrexia. Mirrodin is merely the first."
—Sheoldred, Whispering One
cards.name: Phyrexian Rager
cards.text: When Phyrexian Rager enters the battlefield, you draw a card and you lose 1 life.

cards.flavor: "I can ail what cures you."
cards.name: Plague Witch
cards.text: {B}, {T}, Discard a card: Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.

cards.flavor: "Wait, are we the decoys?"
cards.name: Prowling Pangolin
cards.text: When Prowling Pangolin enters the battlefield, any player may sacrifice two creatures. If a player does, sacrifice Prowling Pangolin.

cards.flavor: "The penalty for idleness is death. The penalty for disputing the penalty is death."
cards.name: Sengir Autocrat
cards.text:
When Sengir Autocrat enters the battlefield, create three 0/1 black Serf creature tokens.
When Sengir Autocrat leaves the battlefield, exile all Serf tokens.

cards.flavor: High walls, a sturdy keep, a strong garrison . . . they made no difference. In a matter of moments, the city was lost.
cards.name: Sinkhole
cards.text: Destroy target land.

cards.flavor:
"They exist only so long as the living take no notice."
—Kifimbo, Shadow guildmage
cards.name: Skulking Ghost
cards.text:
Flying
When Skulking Ghost becomes the target of a spell or ability, sacrifice it.

cards.flavor:
"It's a difficult task to quarantine a plague that moves with the clouds."
—Esara, healer adept
cards.name: Toxic Deluge
cards.text:
As an additional cost to cast Toxic Deluge, pay X life.
All creatures get -X/-X until end of turn.

cards.flavor: Linger on death's door and risk being invited in.
cards.name: Tragic Slip
cards.text:
Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.
Morbid — That creature gets -13/-13 until end of turn instead if a creature died this turn.

cards.name: Twisted Abomination
cards.text:
{B}: Regenerate Twisted Abomination.
Swampcycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Search your library for a Swamp card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.)

cards.flavor: In Urborg, few things are less permanent than death.
cards.name: Urborg Uprising
cards.text:
Return up to two target creature cards from your graveyard to your hand.
Draw a card.

cards.flavor: True power is achieved through blood and sweat. But mostly blood.
cards.name: Vampiric Tutor
cards.text: Search your library for a card, then shuffle your library and put that card on top of it. You lose 2 life.

cards.flavor:
"Die. But die knowing that your pathetic life will yield a great bounty for me."
—Zul Ashur, lich lord
cards.name: Victimize
cards.text: Choose two target creature cards in your graveyard. Sacrifice a creature. If you do, return the chosen cards to the battlefield tapped.

cards.flavor: "My eyes are my strongest feature."
cards.name: Visara the Dreadful
cards.text:
Flying
{T}: Destroy target creature. It can't be regenerated.

cards.flavor:
"So the vulture said to the griffin, ‘You gonna eat that?'"
—Azeworai, "The Ugly Bird"
cards.name: Wake of Vultures
cards.text:
Flying
{1}{B}, Sacrifice a creature: Regenerate Wake of Vultures.

cards.flavor: Hers is an ancient form of necromancy, steeped in shamanic trance and ritual that few skaberen or ghoulcallers comprehend.
cards.name: Wakedancer
cards.text: Morbid — When Wakedancer enters the battlefield, if a creature died this turn, create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token.

cards.name: Avarax
cards.text:
Haste
When Avarax enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a card named Avarax, reveal it, and put it into your hand. If you do, shuffle your library.
{1}{R}: Avarax gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

cards.flavor: The goblins made an unruly pile with military precision.
cards.name: Battle Squadron
cards.text:
Flying
Battle Squadron's power and toughness are each equal to the number of creatures you control.

cards.flavor: Whether trained, ridden, or eaten, few goblin military innovations have rivaled the bug.
cards.name: Beetleback Chief
cards.text: When Beetleback Chief enters the battlefield, create two 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens.

cards.flavor: Though she is rightly feared, there are relatively few tales of her deeds in battle, for few survive her raids.
cards.name: Borderland Marauder
cards.text: Whenever Borderland Marauder attacks, it gets +2/+0 until end of turn.

cards.flavor: Mist is the geists' sorrow. Wind is their pain. Fire is their vengeance.
cards.name: Burning Vengeance
cards.text: Whenever you cast a spell from your graveyard, Burning Vengeance deals 2 damage to target creature or player.

cards.flavor:
"There's no coming back from that."
—Jaya Ballard
cards.name: Carbonize
cards.text: Carbonize deals 3 damage to target creature or player. That creature can't be regenerated this turn. If the creature would die this turn, exile it instead.

cards.name: Chain Lightning
cards.text: Chain Lightning deals 3 damage to target creature or player. Then that player or that creature's controller may pay {R}{R}. If the player does, he or she may copy this spell and may choose a new target for that copy.

cards.name: Crater Hellion
cards.text:
Echo {4}{R}{R} (At the beginning of your upkeep, if this came under your control since the beginning of your last upkeep, sacrifice it unless you pay its echo cost.)
When Crater Hellion enters the battlefield, it deals 4 damage to each other creature.

cards.flavor: Her mind was quite gone, yet she spoke nothing but truth.
cards.name: Desperate Ravings
cards.text:
Draw two cards, then discard a card at random.
Flashback {2}{U} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

cards.flavor: Dragon birth lairs are littered with treasure to entice the young from their eggs.
cards.name: Dragon Egg
cards.text:
Defender (This creature can't attack.)
When Dragon Egg dies, create a 2/2 red Dragon creature token with flying. It has "{R}: This creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn."

cards.flavor: "It has been my experience that disasters like to strike in pairs."
cards.name: Dualcaster Mage
cards.text:
Flash
When Dualcaster Mage enters the battlefield, copy target instant or sorcery spell. You may choose new targets for the copy.

cards.flavor: "Avacyn has abandoned us! We have nothing left except what we can take!"
cards.name: Faithless Looting
cards.text:
Draw two cards, then discard two cards.
Flashback {2}{R} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

cards.flavor: "I'll put my sword down only to die. And I don't plan on doing that today."
cards.name: Fervent Cathar
cards.text:
Haste
When Fervent Cathar enters the battlefield, target creature can't block this turn.

cards.flavor: "There's more where that came from!"
cards.name: Firebolt
cards.text:
Firebolt deals 2 damage to target creature or player.
Flashback {4}{R} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

cards.flavor:
"Fire's out. Should be safe now."
—Gnarltrunk
cards.name: Flame Jab
cards.text:
Flame Jab deals 1 damage to target creature or player.
Retrace (You may cast this card from your graveyard by discarding a land card in addition to paying its other costs.)

cards.flavor: "What's the worst that can happen?"
cards.name: Gamble
cards.text: Search your library for a card, put that card into your hand, discard a card at random, then shuffle your library.

cards.name: Ghitu Slinger
cards.text:
Echo {2}{R} (At the beginning of your upkeep, if this came under your control since the beginning of your last upkeep, sacrifice it unless you pay its echo cost.)
When Ghitu Slinger enters the battlefield, it deals 2 damage to target creature or player.

cards.flavor: To the sorrow of all, its rage became focused on those who once stoked it.
cards.name: Honden of Infinite Rage
cards.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, Honden of Infinite Rage deals damage to target creature or player equal to the number of Shrines you control.

cards.name: Keldon Champion
cards.text:
Haste
Echo {2}{R}{R} (At the beginning of your upkeep, if this came under your control since the beginning of your last upkeep, sacrifice it unless you pay its echo cost.)
When Keldon Champion enters the battlefield, it deals 3 damage to target player.

cards.name: Keldon Marauders
cards.text:
Vanishing 2 (This creature enters the battlefield with two time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter from it. When the last is removed, sacrifice it.)
When Keldon Marauders enters the battlefield or leaves the battlefield, it deals 1 damage to target player.

cards.flavor: It puts the "fur" in "fury."
cards.name: Kird Ape
cards.text: Kird Ape gets +1/+2 as long as you control a Forest.

cards.flavor: "I got it! I got it! I—"
cards.name: Mogg Fanatic
cards.text: Sacrifice Mogg Fanatic: Mogg Fanatic deals 1 damage to target creature or player.

cards.name: Mogg War Marshal
cards.text:
Echo {1}{R} (At the beginning of your upkeep, if this came under your control since the beginning of your last upkeep, sacrifice it unless you pay its echo cost.)
When Mogg War Marshal enters the battlefield or dies, create a 1/1 red Goblin creature token.

cards.flavor: The orcs' banner sends a clear message: "Stand against us and meet the same fate as the goblins."
cards.name: Orcish Oriflamme
cards.text: Attacking creatures you control get +1/+0.

cards.flavor: Enthusiasm can be tempered in the furnace of the earth.
cards.name: Price of Progress
cards.text: Price of Progress deals damage to each player equal to twice the number of nonbasic lands that player controls.

cards.flavor: Water can be crushing, but it is predictable. Fire is always dynamic, its rage absolute and all-consuming.
cards.name: Pyroblast
cards.text:
Choose one —
• Counter target spell if it's blue.
• Destroy target permanent if it's blue.

cards.name: Pyrokinesis
cards.text:
You may exile a red card from your hand rather than pay Pyrokinesis's mana cost.
Pyrokinesis deals 4 damage divided as you choose among any number of target creatures.

cards.name: Reckless Charge
cards.text:
Target creature gets +3/+0 and gains haste until end of turn.
Flashback {2}{R} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

cards.flavor: In an attempt to restore pride to Shiv and to forge an undying legacy, Rorix traveled far to compete for glory in Otaria's Grand Coliseum.
cards.name: Rorix Bladewing
cards.text: Flying, haste

cards.flavor:
"It is not in me to tread lightly."
—Ryda, geomancer
cards.name: Seismic Stomp
cards.text: Creatures without flying can't block this turn.

cards.name: Siege-Gang Commander
cards.text:
When Siege-Gang Commander enters the battlefield, create three 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens.
{1}{R}, Sacrifice a Goblin: Siege-Gang Commander deals 2 damage to target creature or player.

cards.name: Sneak Attack
cards.text: {R}: You may put a creature card from your hand onto the battlefield. That creature gains haste. Sacrifice the creature at the beginning of the next end step.

cards.name: Stingscourger
cards.text:
Echo {3}{R} (At the beginning of your upkeep, if this came under your control since the beginning of your last upkeep, sacrifice it unless you pay its echo cost.)
When Stingscourger enters the battlefield, return target creature an opponent controls to its owner's hand.

cards.name: Sulfuric Vortex
cards.text:
At the beginning of each player's upkeep, Sulfuric Vortex deals 2 damage to that player.
If a player would gain life, that player gains no life instead.

cards.flavor:
"Don't spend long examining signs of its passage. That you find them at all means it's still close at hand."
—Varra, Warden of the East Road
cards.name: Tooth and Claw
cards.text: Sacrifice two creatures: Create a 3/1 red Beast creature token named Carnivore.

cards.name: Undying Rage
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and can't block.
When Undying Rage is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, return Undying Rage to its owner's hand.

cards.flavor:
"The efreet is a striding storm with a voice that crackles like fire."
—Qhattib, vizier of Amiqat
cards.name: Wildfire Emissary
cards.text:
Protection from white
{1}{R}: Wildfire Emissary gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

cards.name: Worldgorger Dragon
cards.text:
Flying, trample
When Worldgorger Dragon enters the battlefield, exile all other permanents you control.
When Worldgorger Dragon leaves the battlefield, return the exiled cards to the battlefield under their owners' control.

cards.flavor: Immolation is the sincerest form of flattery.
cards.name: Young Pyromancer
cards.text: Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, create a 1/1 red Elemental creature token.

cards.name: Abundant Growth
cards.text:
Enchant land
When Abundant Growth enters the battlefield, draw a card.
Enchanted land has "{T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool."

cards.flavor: "I pass to you all we have ever been. Go forth and become all we never could."
cards.name: Ancestral Mask
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 for each other enchantment on the battlefield.

cards.name: Argothian Enchantress
cards.text:
Shroud (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities.)
Whenever you cast an enchantment spell, draw a card.

cards.flavor:
"‘I have arrived,' bellowed Brawn, and the plane shuddered."
—Scroll of Beginnings
cards.name: Brawn
cards.text:
Trample
As long as Brawn is in your graveyard and you control a Forest, creatures you control have trample.

cards.name: Centaur Chieftain
cards.text:
Haste
Threshold — As long as seven or more cards are in your graveyard, Centaur Chieftain has "When Centaur Chieftain enters the battlefield, creatures you control get +1/+1 and gain trample until end of turn."

cards.flavor: "These alleys are not safe. Come, I can guide you back to the market square."
cards.name: Civic Wayfinder
cards.text: When Civic Wayfinder enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. If you do, shuffle your library.

cards.flavor: For the first time in many years, Elspeth asked for help.
cards.name: Commune with the Gods
cards.text: Reveal the top five cards of your library. You may put a creature or enchantment card from among them into your hand. Put the rest into your graveyard.

cards.name: Elephant Guide
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +3/+3.
When enchanted creature dies, create a 3/3 green Elephant creature token.

cards.flavor: "Our lives are woven together like the trees' branches over our heads, forming a canopy that protects us all."
cards.name: Elvish Vanguard
cards.text: Whenever another Elf enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on Elvish Vanguard.

cards.flavor: The king of Yavimaya's waters pays constant attention to his subjects . . . and thrives on their adulation.
cards.name: Emperor Crocodile
cards.text: When you control no other creatures, sacrifice Emperor Crocodile.

cards.flavor: Through the smoke and flames it hunts, sniffing out the panicked and confused.
cards.name: Flinthoof Boar
cards.text:
Flinthoof Boar gets +1/+1 as long as you control a Mountain.
{R}: Flinthoof Boar gains haste until end of turn. (It can attack and {T} this turn.)

cards.flavor:
"I fear no army or beast, but only the morning fog. Our assault can survive everything else."
—Lord Hilneth
cards.name: Fog
cards.text: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn.

cards.name: Gaea's Blessing
cards.text:
Target player shuffles up to three target cards from his or her graveyard into his or her library.
Draw a card.
When Gaea's Blessing is put into your graveyard from your library, shuffle your graveyard into your library.

cards.flavor: As the green sun crowned, Phyrexian prophecies glowed on the Tree of Tales.
cards.name: Green Sun's Zenith
cards.text: Search your library for a green creature card with converted mana cost X or less, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle your library. Shuffle Green Sun's Zenith into its owner's library.

cards.flavor: "Words lie. People lie. The land tells the truth."
cards.name: Harmonize
cards.text: Draw three cards.

cards.flavor:
"Study the great spirits of our age and those of the past. Prune secrets from the branching traceries of our lineage."
—Twila, Gilt-Leaf archdruid
cards.name: Heritage Druid
cards.text: Tap three untapped Elves you control: Add {G}{G}{G} to your mana pool.

cards.flavor: To the sorrow of all, its web became a net that strangled those who helped weave it.
cards.name: Honden of Life's Web
cards.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, create a 1/1 colorless Spirit creature token for each Shrine you control.

cards.flavor: In a culture of beauty, the most beautiful are worshipped as gods.
cards.name: Imperious Perfect
cards.text:
Other Elf creatures you control get +1/+1.
{G}, {T}: Create a 1/1 green Elf Warrior creature token.

cards.name: Invigorate
cards.text:
If you control a Forest, rather than pay Invigorate's mana cost, you may have an opponent gain 3 life.
Target creature gets +4/+4 until end of turn.

cards.flavor:
One bone broken for every twig snapped underfoot.
—Llanowar penalty for trespassing
cards.name: Llanowar Elves
cards.text: {T}: Add {G} to your mana pool.

cards.flavor: From the highest tiers of Dawn's Light Palace to the deepest shade of Wren's Run, the silver notes of the horn shimmer through the air, and all who hear it feel its pull.
cards.name: Lys Alana Huntmaster
cards.text: Whenever you cast an Elf spell, you may create a 1/1 green Elf Warrior creature token.

cards.flavor: . . . but the price of Mangara's freedom was Asmira's life.
cards.name: Natural Order
cards.text:
As an additional cost to cast Natural Order, sacrifice a green creature.
Search your library for a green creature card and put it onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

cards.flavor:
"The timeless, tireless jaws of nature shall one day devour us all."
—Sildark, artificer of Omu
cards.name: Nature's Claim
cards.text: Destroy target artifact or enchantment. Its controller gains 4 life.

cards.flavor: One thread connected all the travelers' stories: the ferocity of the mongoose.
cards.name: Nimble Mongoose
cards.text:
Shroud (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities.)
Threshold — Nimble Mongoose gets +2/+2 as long as seven or more cards are in your graveyard.

cards.name: Rancor
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+0 and has trample.
When Rancor is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, return Rancor to its owner's hand.

cards.flavor: It rarely moves, standing stock still in its clearing. When it does stir, ravens stop their cawing and crickets their chirping. All of nature watches in awed silence.
cards.name: Regal Force
cards.text: When Regal Force enters the battlefield, draw a card for each green creature you control.

cards.name: Roar of the Wurm
cards.text:
Create a 6/6 green Wurm creature token.
Flashback {3}{G} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

cards.name: Roots
cards.text:
Enchant creature without flying
When Roots enters the battlefield, tap enchanted creature.
Enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.

cards.flavor: When does majestic become ominous?
cards.name: Seal of Strength
cards.text: Sacrifice Seal of Strength: Target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn.

cards.flavor:
"Your first reaction may be to stand very still and hope she didn't see you. Trust me, she did."
—Endril, Kalonian naturalist
cards.name: Sentinel Spider
cards.text:
Vigilance (Attacking doesn't cause this creature to tap.)
Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)

cards.flavor: He was born of the Mirari, thrust out of his homeland before he was even aware. Left without purpose or meaning, he found both in the pits.
cards.name: Silvos, Rogue Elemental
cards.text:
Trample
{G}: Regenerate Silvos, Rogue Elemental.

cards.name: Sylvan Library
cards.text: At the beginning of your draw step, you may draw two additional cards. If you do, choose two cards in your hand drawn this turn. For each of those cards, pay 4 life or put the card on top of your library.

cards.name: Sylvan Might
cards.text:
Target creature gets +2/+2 and gains trample until end of turn.
Flashback {2}{G}{G} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

cards.flavor: Their arrows are tipped with basilisk eyes and fletched with cockatrice feathers.
cards.name: Thornweald Archer
cards.text:
Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)
Deathtouch (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)

cards.flavor: "If you ever want to leave this forest, now's the time."
cards.name: Timberwatch Elf
cards.text: {T}: Target creature gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the number of Elves on the battlefield.

cards.flavor: To become is to understand.
cards.name: Werebear
cards.text:
{T}: Add {G} to your mana pool.
Threshold — Werebear gets +3/+3 as long as seven or more cards are in your graveyard.

cards.flavor:
"Let the wild in. Channel its strength."
—Freyalise
cards.name: Wirewood Symbiote
cards.text: Return an Elf you control to its owner's hand: Untap target creature. Activate this ability only once each turn.

cards.flavor: When they land on you, all you can think about is tearing them off.
cards.name: Xantid Swarm
cards.text:
Flying
Whenever Xantid Swarm attacks, defending player can't cast spells this turn.

cards.flavor: Her roots connect her to the forest's wishes.
cards.name: Yavimaya Enchantress
cards.text: Yavimaya Enchantress gets +1/+1 for each enchantment on the battlefield.

cards.flavor: "Don't laugh. It works."
cards.name: Armadillo Cloak
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has trample.
Whenever enchanted creature deals damage, you gain that much life.

cards.flavor: Its beak rends flesh and bone, exposing the tender marrow of dream.
cards.name: Baleful Strix
cards.text:
Flying, deathtouch
When Baleful Strix enters the battlefield, draw a card.

cards.name: Bloodbraid Elf
cards.text:
Haste
Cascade (When you cast this spell, exile cards from the top of your library until you exile a nonland card that costs less. You may cast it without paying its mana cost. Put the exiled cards on the bottom of your library in a random order.)

cards.flavor: "My rule persists beyond death itself."
cards.name: Brago, King Eternal
cards.text:
Flying
Whenever Brago, King Eternal deals combat damage to a player, exile any number of target nonland permanents you control, then return those cards to the battlefield under their owner's control.

cards.name: Dack Fayden
cards.text:
+1: Target player draws two cards, then discards two cards.
−2: Gain control of target artifact.
−6: You get an emblem with "Whenever you cast a spell that targets one or more permanents, gain control of those permanents."

cards.flavor: If you want to wreak havoc above, sometimes it's best to look below.
cards.name: Extract from Darkness
cards.text: Each player puts the top two cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard. Then put a creature card from a graveyard onto the battlefield under your control.

cards.flavor: Boros soldiers are like a cache of bombs ready to explode, and the flame-kin light their fuses.
cards.name: Flame-Kin Zealot
cards.text: When Flame-Kin Zealot enters the battlefield, creatures you control get +1/+1 and gain haste until end of turn.

cards.flavor: The righteous light of Selesnya is channeled through the devout, striking out to blind the nonbelievers.
cards.name: Glare of Subdual
cards.text: Tap an untapped creature you control: Tap target artifact or creature.

cards.flavor:
"Even if we dislodge them, I fear these lands will never again yield crops."
—Kimmick, vanguard knight
cards.name: Goblin Trenches
cards.text: {2}, Sacrifice a land: Create two 1/1 red and white Goblin Soldier creature tokens.

cards.name: Maelstrom Wanderer
cards.text:
Creatures you control have haste.
Cascade, cascade (When you cast this spell, exile cards from the top of your library until you exile a nonland card that costs less. You may cast it without paying its mana cost. Put the exiled cards on the bottom of your library in a random order. Then do it again.)

cards.flavor: To the elves, her spear is a compass; to the boggarts, a harbinger of doom.
cards.name: Shaman of the Pack
cards.text: When Shaman of the Pack enters the battlefield, target opponent loses life equal to the number of Elves you control.

cards.name: Shardless Agent
cards.text: Cascade (When you cast this spell, exile cards from the top of your library until you exile a nonland card that costs less. You may cast it without paying its mana cost. Put the exiled cards on the bottom of your library in a random order.)

cards.flavor: No one has properly answered her favorite riddle: "Why should I spare your life?"
cards.name: Sphinx of the Steel Wind
cards.text: Flying, first strike, vigilance, lifelink, protection from red and from green

cards.flavor: Thunder doesn't always mean rain. Sometimes it means ruin.
cards.name: Thunderclap Wyvern
cards.text:
Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)
Flying
Other creatures you control with flying get +1/+1.

cards.flavor: Held aloft by metabolized magic, trygons are ravenous for sources of mystic fuel.
cards.name: Trygon Predator
cards.text:
Flying
Whenever Trygon Predator deals combat damage to a player, you may destroy target artifact or enchantment that player controls.

cards.flavor:
"I have seen entire civilizations rise and fall. You mortals are but dust to me."
—Sorin Markov
cards.name: Vindicate
cards.text: Destroy target permanent.

cards.name: Void
cards.text: Choose a number. Destroy all artifacts and creatures with converted mana cost equal to that number. Then target player reveals his or her hand and discards all nonland cards with converted mana cost equal to the number.

cards.flavor:
"The blazekite is a simple concept, really—just a vehicular application of dragscoop ionics and electropropulsion magnetronics."
—Juzba, Izzet tinker
cards.name: Wee Dragonauts
cards.text:
Flying
Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, Wee Dragonauts gets +2/+0 until end of turn.

cards.flavor:
"Jharic returned from Grixis changed, a haunted look in her eyes. She destroyed them with an unholy glee that made me shudder."
—Knight-Captain Wyhorn
cards.name: Zealous Persecution
cards.text: Until end of turn, creatures you control get +1/+1 and creatures your opponents control get -1/-1.

cards.flavor: It hears and answers every orison across Shadowmoor.
cards.name: Call the Skybreaker
cards.text:
Create a 5/5 blue and red Elemental creature token with flying.
Retrace (You may cast this card from your graveyard by discarding a land card in addition to paying its other costs.)

cards.name: Deathrite Shaman
cards.text:
{T}: Exile target land card from a graveyard. Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.
{B}, {T}: Exile target instant or sorcery card from a graveyard. Each opponent loses 2 life.
{G}, {T}: Exile target creature card from a graveyard. You gain 2 life.

cards.flavor:
"If you'd ever met one, you wouldn't ask me to justify the extra provisions for additional security."
—Lorref, caravan master
cards.name: Giant Solifuge
cards.text:
({R/G} can be paid with either {R} or {G}.)
Trample; haste; shroud (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities.)

cards.name: Torrent of Souls
cards.text: Return up to one target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield if {B} was spent to cast Torrent of Souls. Creatures target player controls get +2/+0 and gain haste until end of turn if {R} was spent to cast Torrent of Souls. (Do both if {B}{R} was spent.)

cards.flavor:
"If you work at sawing up carcasses, you notice how the joints fit, how the nerves are arrayed, and how the skin peels back."
—Ashnod, to Tawnos
cards.name: Ashnod's Altar
cards.text: Sacrifice a creature: Add {C}{C} to your mana pool.

cards.name: Chrome Mox
cards.text:
Imprint — When Chrome Mox enters the battlefield, you may exile a nonartifact, nonland card from your hand.
{T}: Add one mana of any of the exiled card's colors to your mana pool.

cards.name: Duplicant
cards.text:
Imprint — When Duplicant enters the battlefield, you may exile target nontoken creature.
As long as a card exiled with Duplicant is a creature card, Duplicant has the power, toughness, and creature types of the last creature card exiled with Duplicant. It's still a Shapeshifter.

cards.flavor: It is like life and destiny: we think we know the story, but we have read only half the tale.
cards.name: Emmessi Tome
cards.text: {5}, {T}: Draw two cards, then discard a card.

cards.name: Goblin Charbelcher
cards.text: {3}, {T}: Reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a land card. Goblin Charbelcher deals damage equal to the number of nonland cards revealed this way to target creature or player. If the revealed land card was a Mountain, Goblin Charbelcher deals double that damage instead. Put the revealed cards on the bottom of your library in any order.

cards.name: Isochron Scepter
cards.text:
Imprint — When Isochron Scepter enters the battlefield, you may exile an instant card with converted mana cost 2 or less from your hand.
{2}, {T}: You may copy the exiled card. If you do, you may cast the copy without paying its mana cost.

cards.flavor: Many a besieged city has surrendered upon hearing the distinctive rumble of the juggernaut.
cards.name: Juggernaut
cards.text:
Juggernaut attacks each turn if able.
Juggernaut can't be blocked by Walls.

cards.name: Mana Crypt
cards.text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, flip a coin. If you lose the flip, Mana Crypt deals 3 damage to you.
{T}: Add {C}{C} to your mana pool.

cards.flavor: The toymaker frowned in bewilderment. None of his creations had ever sneezed before.
cards.name: Millikin
cards.text: {T}, Put the top card of your library into your graveyard: Add {C} to your mana pool.

cards.name: Mindless Automaton
cards.text:
Mindless Automaton enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it.
{1}, Discard a card: Put a +1/+1 counter on Mindless Automaton.
Remove two +1/+1 counters from Mindless Automaton: Draw a card.

cards.name: Nevinyrral's Disk
cards.text:
Nevinyrral's Disk enters the battlefield tapped.
{1}, {T}: Destroy all artifacts, creatures, and enchantments.

cards.flavor: The kor send their thopter kites to see if the land is in a welcoming mood.
cards.name: Pilgrim's Eye
cards.text:
Flying
When Pilgrim's Eye enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.

cards.flavor: It bends not light but mana, aligning its chaotic currents into the sharp angles necessary for the mystic's purposes.
cards.name: Prismatic Lens
cards.text:
{T}: Add {C} to your mana pool.
{1}, {T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.

cards.flavor: Elves believe the hydra-god Progenitus sleeps beneath Naya, feeding on forgotten magics.
cards.name: Relic of Progenitus
cards.text:
{T}: Target player exiles a card from his or her graveyard.
{1}, Exile Relic of Progenitus: Exile all cards from all graveyards. Draw a card.

cards.name: Sensei's Divining Top
cards.text:
{1}: Look at the top three cards of your library, then put them back in any order.
{T}: Draw a card, then put Sensei's Divining Top on top of its owner's library.

cards.name: Ticking Gnomes
cards.text:
Echo {3} (At the beginning of your upkeep, if this came under your control since the beginning of your last upkeep, sacrifice it unless you pay its echo cost.)
Sacrifice Ticking Gnomes: Ticking Gnomes deals 1 damage to target creature or player.

cards.flavor:
"How could anyone survive this? There is some force at work that stifles even the will to go on."
—Naromin, veteran explorer
cards.name: Winter Orb
cards.text: As long as Winter Orb is untapped, players can't untap more than one land during their untap steps.

cards.flavor: Even a fragment of a powerstone contains within it not just energy, but space—vast dimensions trapped in fragile crystal.
